content.rendered:
Directed by Elli Hakami. Julian P. Hobbs

Cast Casey Hammer( Self3 episodes, 2022 ). Michael Armand Hammer( Self3 episodes, 2022 ). Courtney Vucekovich( Self3 episodes, 2022 ). Candice Cronkite( Self – @bbfbravo3 episodes, 2022 ). Lauren Skae( Self – @thezenblonde3 episodes, 2022 ). Elizabeth Chambers( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Ryan Bailey( Self – Armie Hammer classmate2 episodes, 2022 ). Julia Morrison( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Gloria Allred( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). JR Long( Armie Hammer2 episodes, 2022 ). Edward Jay Epstein( Self – Author + Investigation Journalist2 episodes, 2022 ). Paige Lorenze( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Dru Ann Hammer( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Neil Lyndon( Self – Armand Hammer’s Former Political + Media Consultant2 episodes, 2022 ). Julian Armand Hammer( Self2 episodes, 2022 ). Francesca Bacardi( Self – Chief Reporter at Page Six2 episodes, 2022 ). Pete Davidson( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Armand Hammer( Self3 episodes, 2022 ). Scott Abramovitch( Self – The Hollywood Reporter Journalist1 episode, 2022 ). Joseph Finder( Self – Author + Graduate, Harvard Russian Research Center1 episode, 2022 ). Mistress Damiana Chi( Self – Professional Dominatrix + BDSM Educator1 episode, 2022 ). Andrew B. Brettler( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Cathe Boal( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Mariann Vitamanti( Self – Hammer Family Friend1 episode, 2022 ). Wendy Williams( Self1 episode, 2022)

Producers Pamela Deutsch. Tiffany Do. Joseph Eardly. Elli Hakami. Elissa Halperin. Julian P. Hobbs. Francesca Newton. Meredith Russell. Jami Schultz. Julian Seltzer

Production Talos Films.

Certificate 16+

Official site Talos Website

Season 1

Episodes 3
